repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives and Special Collections

did.abstract: The collection consists of individual aerial photographs (maps) and indexes. The majority of the collection consists of images of Whitman County and the Pullman region, but additional sets of photographic indexes to two other Washington counties are included, as are a sequence documenting the lower Columbia River.
did.physloc: (Internal Use Only) Due to their size, these photographs are located in the oversized map cases.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of individual aerial photographs (maps) and indexes. The majority of the collection consists of images of Whitman County and the Pullman region, but additional sets of photographic indexes to two other Washington counties are included, as are a sequence documenting the lower Columbia River. Virtually all of the sets of photographs are incomplete.

arrangement.p: The photographs are foldered in sets and organized primarily with preservation in mind, with the more commonly used (Pullman/Whitman regions) above the less often used. Pullman-region images are first, listed chronologically, then Whitman County, again chronologically, followed by the remaining two folders, with the more fragile Columbia River photographs located beneath the others.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

userestrict.p: Materials may be subject to copyright.

prefercite.p: Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: The aerial photographs in this collection were primarily remnants - acquired as parts of other collections or as individual unaccessioned gifts over a number of years.

processinfo.p: This collection was processed in December, 2011 by University Archivist Mark O'English.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

did.unittitle: Pullman area aerial photo maps. Oct. 1940. 116th Photo Section, 41st Div. Scale 1:9,000. 4 pieces (2 copies each of 2 images), 19"x20", complete.
Pullman area aerial photographs. Sept. 6, 1952. No origin or scale given; photographs include identifiers of format ##VV 106TRS R575-T52 TAC. 18 photographs, 10"x10", apparently complete.
Pullman area aerial photographs. May 28, 1957. No origin or scale given; photographs include identifiers of format CCI-10T-###. 11 photographs, 26"x26", incomplete

Whitman County aerial photographs. Includes Pullman (CCI-252-70) and Lewiston/Clarkston. July 18, 1939 - Oct. 12, 1939. No origin or scale given; photographs include identifiers of format CCI-2##-###. 22 photographs, 28"x22", incomplete

Whitman County aerial photographs. Includes Pullman (CCI-2G-130). Aug. 16, 1950 - Sept. 22, 1950. No origin or scale given; photographs include identifiers of format CCI-#G-###. 33 photographs, 14"x17", incomplete

Spokane County, WA and Walla Walla County, WA aerial indexes. 1950-1951. U.S. Department of Agriculture, Production and Marketing Administration. Scale 1:200,000. 15 sheets, 19"x24", complete save that sheet 6 of Spokane County is missing.
Columbia River, Vancouver to Bonneville Dam. Ca. 1934-1937. Brubaker Aerial Surveys of Portland, OR. 5 pieces, 43"x8", complete.
